result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí in Aontroim
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí in Aontroim
result.html: Tá mé i mo chónaí in AontroimI live in Antrim.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ċónaí in AontroimI live in Antrim.

result.eng: Cavan had an easy victory over the Antrim team.
